list.name: Time region for panel Total number of users

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) from users;

panels.title: All users

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT 
        COUNT(day_reports.uuid) AS day_reports_amount, 
        users.name
    FROM users
    LEFT JOIN ways ON ways.owner_uuid = users.uuid
    LEFT JOIN day_reports ON day_reports.way_uuid = ways.uuid
    GROUP BY users.uuid, users.name
) AS subquery
WHERE day_reports_amount >= 3;

panels.title: All  Users who created at least 3 reports for all time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT 
        COUNT(day_reports.uuid) AS day_reports_amount, 
        users.name
    FROM users
    LEFT JOIN ways ON ways.owner_uuid = users.uuid
    LEFT JOIN day_reports ON day_reports.way_uuid = ways.uuid
    GROUP BY users.uuid, users.name
) AS subquery
WHERE day_reports_amount >= 10;

panels.title: All  Users who created at least 10 reports

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT (*) 
FROM users
WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'

panels.title: New Users in past 30 days

targets.rawSql:
select * from (
 select count(day_reports.uuid) as day_reports_amount, users.name from users
 left join ways on ways.owner_uuid = users."uuid"
 left join day_reports on day_reports.way_uuid = ways.uuid
 where
 (users.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days')
 group by users.uuid
) where day_reports_amount > 3;

panels.title: New Users who create 3 reports

targets.rawSql:
select * from (
 select count(day_reports.uuid) as day_reports_amount, users.name from users
 left join ways on ways.owner_uuid = users."uuid"
 left join day_reports on day_reports.way_uuid = ways.uuid
 where
 (users.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days')
 group by users.uuid
 order by day_reports_amount DESC
) where day_reports_amount > 10;

panels.title: New Users who create 10 reports

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ways;

panels.title: All Ways

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM ways
WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'

panels.title: New Ways in past 30 days

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT users.uuid) FROM users join ways on ways.owner_uuid = users.uuid WHERE ways.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days';

panels.title: Ways created in last 30 days

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM trainings;

panels.title: Total Trainings

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT (*) 
FROM trainings
WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'

panels.title: New Trainings in past 30 days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    COUNT (ways.copied_from_way_uuid )
FROM 
    ways
where 
 ways.copied_from_way_uuid IS NOT NULL;

panels.title: Number of ways copied from Ways

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    COUNT (ways.copied_from_trainings_uuid )
FROM 
    ways
where 
 ways.copied_from_way_uuid IS NOT NULL;

panels.title: Number of ways copied from Ways

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  'Free' AS metric, 
  COUNT(users.uuid) AS value, 
  NOW() AS time 
FROM profile_settings
JOIN users
  ON users.uuid = profile_settings.owner_uuid
WHERE profile_settings.pricing_plan = 'free'

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Starter' AS metric, 
  COUNT(users.uuid) AS value, 
  NOW() AS time 
FROM profile_settings
JOIN users
  ON users.uuid = profile_settings.owner_uuid
WHERE profile_settings.pricing_plan = 'starter'

UNION ALL

SELECT
  'Pro' AS metric, 
  COUNT(users.uuid) AS value, 
  NOW() AS time 
FROM profile_settings
JOIN users
  ON users.uuid = profile_settings.owner_uuid
WHERE profile_settings.pricing_plan = 'pro';

panels.title: Amount of users for each pricing plan for all time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    COUNT(mentor_users_ways.way_uuid) as users_count,
    NOW() as time
FROM 
    users 
LEFT JOIN 
    mentor_users_ways  ON users.uuid = mentor_users_ways.user_uuid
GROUP BY 
    users .uuid, users .name

panels.title: Amount of mentors per users

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('month', created_at) AS time,
  SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('month', created_at)) AS total_users
FROM users
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('month', created_at)

panels.title: Total number of users
NUMBER OF USERS WHICH HAVE X REPORTS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at) AS time,
  SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at)) AS total_users
FROM users
JOIN (
  SELECT ways.owner_uuid
  FROM ways
  JOIN day_reports ON ways.uuid = day_reports.way_uuid
  GROUP BY ways.owner_uuid
  HAVING COUNT(day_reports.uuid) > 1
) AS report_counts ON users.uuid = report_counts.owner_uuid
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at)

panels.title: Total number of users which have more than 1 report

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at) AS time,
  SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at))
    AS total_users
FROM users
JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT ways.owner_uuid
  FROM ways
  JOIN day_reports ON ways.uuid = day_reports.way_uuid
  GROUP BY ways.owner_uuid
  HAVING COUNT(day_reports.uuid) > 3
) AS report_counts ON users.uuid = report_counts.owner_uuid
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at)
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: Total number of users which have more than 3 reports

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at) AS time,
  SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at))
    AS total_users
FROM users
JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT ways.owner_uuid
  FROM ways
  JOIN day_reports ON ways.uuid = day_reports.way_uuid
  GROUP BY ways.owner_uuid
  HAVING COUNT(day_reports.uuid) > 20
) AS report_counts ON users.uuid = report_counts.owner_uuid
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at)
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: Total number of users which have more than 20 reports

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at) AS time,
  SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at))
    AS total_users
FROM users
JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT ways.owner_uuid
  FROM ways
  JOIN day_reports ON ways.uuid = day_reports.way_uuid
  GROUP BY ways.owner_uuid
  HAVING COUNT(day_reports.uuid) > 30
) AS report_counts ON users.uuid = report_counts.owner_uuid
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', users.created_at)

panels.title: Total number of users which have more than 30 reports
NUMBER OF REPORT PER WAY

targets.rawSql:
WITH report_counts_per_way AS (
  SELECT
    way_uuid,
    COUNT(uuid) AS report_count
  FROM day_reports
  GROUP BY way_uuid
)
SELECT
  report_count,
  COUNT(way_uuid) AS way_count,
  NOW() AS time
FROM report_counts_per_way
GROUP BY report_count
ORDER BY report_count ASC;

panels.title: Number of Reports per Way for all time(reports/way)

targets.rawSql:
WITH report_counts_per_way AS (
  SELECT
    way_uuid,
    COUNT(uuid) AS report_count
  FROM day_reports
  WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 year'
  GROUP BY way_uuid
)
SELECT
  report_count,
  COUNT(way_uuid) AS way_count,
  NOW() AS time
FROM report_counts_per_way
GROUP BY report_count
ORDER BY report_count ASC;

panels.title: Number of Reports per Way for last year(reports/way)

targets.rawSql:
WITH report_counts_per_way AS (
  SELECT
    way_uuid,
    COUNT(uuid) AS report_count
  FROM day_reports
  WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '90 days'
  GROUP BY way_uuid
)
SELECT
  report_count,
  COUNT(way_uuid) AS way_count,
  NOW() AS time
FROM report_counts_per_way
GROUP BY report_count
ORDER BY report_count ASC;

panels.title: Number of Reports per Way for last 90 days(reports/way)

targets.rawSql:
WITH report_counts_per_way AS (
  SELECT
    way_uuid,
    COUNT(uuid) AS report_count
  FROM day_reports
  WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
  GROUP BY way_uuid
)
SELECT
  report_count,
  COUNT(way_uuid) AS way_count,
  NOW() AS time
FROM report_counts_per_way
GROUP BY report_count
ORDER BY report_count ASC;

panels.title: Number of Reports per Way for last 30 days(reports/way)

targets.rawSql:
WITH report_counts_per_way AS (
  SELECT
    way_uuid,
    COUNT(uuid) AS report_count
  FROM day_reports
  WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
  GROUP BY way_uuid
)
SELECT
  report_count,
  COUNT(way_uuid) AS way_count,
  NOW() AS time
FROM report_counts_per_way
GROUP BY report_count
ORDER BY report_count ASC;

panels.title: Number of Reports per Way for last 7 days(reports/way)
